text: Guilherme Castro Boulos (São Paulo, 1982) is a Brazilian politician, militant, professor and writer. He is a member of the National Coordination of Homeless Workers' Movement and is known as one of the main far-left leaders in Brazil. Boulos is the Socialism and Liberty Party (PSOL) candidate for the presidency of Brazil in the 2018 general election. He joined PSOL in 2018. ==References== Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from São Paulo Category:Political writers Category:Brazilian writers
title: Guilherme Boulos
